column4: If I cat /dev/video0 with my webcam plugged in I get garbage.  When I cat /dev/video0 with webcam not plugged in I get file not found.  When I turn on Camorama it says it cannot find video.  I have an old logitech webcam.  Help!
well, if you cat it, you should get garbage - by doing so, you're taking data from your camera and sending it to the terminal, at least that's my understanding of what you're doing
there must be some setting somewhere for camorama... it's probably looking for /dev/somethingwacky0 and you have to change it
